alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Dallas; Grant; Hot Spring; Jefferson; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 7:39AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Cleveland, Grant, northeastern Dallas, southwestern Jefferson, south central Saline and southeastern Hot Spring Counties through 830 AM CDT... At 739 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Traskwood to near Poyen to 11 miles west of Thiel. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pine Bluff... Sheridan... White Hall... Traskwood... Leola... Tull... Carthage... Prattsville... Poyen... Lamont... Jenkins Ferry State Park... Pine Bluff Arsenal... Warbritton... Thiel... Dogwood... Cane Creek... Sulphur Springs... Belfast... Ain... Lono... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Cleveland; Dallas; Grant; Hot Spring; Jefferson; Saline
